alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 07 at 1:58PM CST until November 08 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. Smoke from local fires can reduce visibility to less than 100 feet across small portions of the advised area. * WHERE...Southeast St. Tammany, Eastern Orleans, Northern St. Tammany and Southwestern St. Tammany Parishes. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Smoke mixing with fog can create dangerous driving conditions. Plan extra time for your morning commute through this area and be prepared for sudden changes in both visibility and traffic conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
